fields.Title: SEAFORT / THE DESERTER
fields.Description:
Meet the Deserter, gun in hand, by the extinguished fire. 

AUTHORITY  (PSYCHE) red check

fields.Title: You: ""I want to ask again about the peop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I want to ask again about the people you don't like."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I ain't going anywhere.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I ain't going anywhere."

fields.Title: You: "Let it vanish."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it vanish.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""In Graad they sang 'Brave Children..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In Graad they sang 'Brave Children, Favourites of History' and in Hsin-Yao it was..." He struggles to remember, then gives up. "...some Samaran shit, I guess."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "In Hsin-Yao they sang "Boy with a S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In Hsin-Yao they sang "Boy with a Scythe / Golden Sun."

fields.Title: You: ""It's as he said: it's a Triangong...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's as he said: it's a Triangong. Made in Hsin-Yao."
fields.Alternate1: "It's as you said. This is a Triangong."

fields.Title: You: ""That's insane.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's insane."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- what? To get things going a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- what? To get things going again..." The lieutenant steps closer. "Fan the flame?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The combined might of internationa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The combined might of international capital, all at once -- all the greed and terror in the world -- tore into Revachol. It lifted streets from the ground and turned houses into ghosts. We were in the flak tower..." He gestures toward it.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man does not say more. Thos..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man does not say more. Those black eyes of his keep piercing you, as he looks to some great distance and shakes his head slowly -- retreating from it.

fields.Title: You: ""That's right. I'm with the good gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right. I'm with the good guys."
fields.Alternate1: "That's right. We're with the good guys."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Murderers..." He stares at the emb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Murderers..." He stares at the embers, then into your eyes. "You're the RCM -- you represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""If the Party had surrendered -- th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If the Party had surrendered -- then it would not be the Party."
fields.Alternate1: He just wipes the blood from his chin.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The what now?" He cups his ear. "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The what now?" He cups his ear. "I can't hear you."

fields.Title: You: ""We have *drouamine*. And other opi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We have *drouamine*. And other opioid based painkillers. You must be in pain."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He looks at you, his face parched f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He looks at you, his face parched from the sun and the wind -- there's a wince of pain in there somewhere.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Are they not heartbroken? How could..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Are they not heartbroken? How could they have moved on?

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I do." He coughs."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do." He coughs.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""And others too. Some cordons of Re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And others too. Some cordons of Revachol were still fighting. There were cells, I tried to contact them..." He shakes his head. "Soon they all went silent. The frequencies, dead."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""At night. I used a dinghy..." He n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At night. I used a dinghy..." He nods toward the deflated tyre in the reeds. "I only went after dark then. When I got to the city I stayed underground. Patrols. You lot. The commons too, they'd started snitching..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Sleeping..." He coughs. "Some nigh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sleeping..." He coughs. "Some nights. Ammo-scrounging on others. Those Magraves were shit even before they corroded -- some had bullets in the chamber, however."

fields.Title: You: "Not important."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not important.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man looks across the water:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man looks across the water: at the city, the ruins, the motorways rising above it...
fields.Alternate1: The old man looks inland: at the city, the ruins, the motorways rising above it. The new *batiments* twinkling in the night sky.
fields.Alternate2: The old man looks inland: at the city, the ruins, the motorways rising above it. The new *batiments* twinkling in the evening sky.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man stares at the reeds. Hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man stares at the reeds. His face shows no emotion -- only a faint tremor passes over his features, like a leaf in the wind.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Cuno: ""The fuck?!" Cuno's looking at you..."]
Savoir Faire: "The *position*? Sounds like a hidin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The *position*? Sounds like a hiding place...

fields.Title: Authority: "It's a good line, but your voice sl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a good line, but your voice slips on *commander*, producing a little squeak. Sounds like you're afraid.
fields.Alternate1: It's a good line but your voice slips on *commander*, producing a miserly little squeak. Sounds like you're afraid.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It's war time slang for an experien..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's war time slang for an experienced soldier of high rank. From the days of the Revolution in Revachol.

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""It's out of bullets." The old man..."]
The Deserter: ""The future teaches you to be alone.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The future teaches you to be alone."

fields.Title: You: ""What is La Revacholire?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is La Revacholire?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's the *drugs* you're all on. Dr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's the *drugs* you're all on. Druggies, winos, and whores..." He closes his eyes in disgust.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Yes. Recruited from Jamrock in '07..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Recruited from Jamrock in '07, trained in the Ecole de Contrle Arien; consigned to emergency defence duties in '08."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Women *are* more susceptible to bo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Women *are* more susceptible to bourgeois morals." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

fields.Title: You: "This is not the time to push."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is not the time to push.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""For Reaction to take hold.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "For Reaction to take hold."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The mask of humanity fall from cap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The mask of humanity fall from capital. It has to take it off to kill everyone -- everything you love; all the hope and tenderness in the world. It has to take it off, just for one second. To do the deed."

fields.Title: You: ""That's definitely enough now.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's definitely enough now."

fields.Title: You: ""You've lost your mind.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've lost your mind."

fields.Title: You: ""You mean the Landing? Retaking of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean the Landing? Retaking of Revachol?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Sure you are, you're RCM. Answer m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure you are, you're RCM. Answer me -- who calls an operation against 50 million people *Death Blow*?"

fields.Title: You: ""But you said you were trained and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But you said you were trained and assigned to the Defence Corps."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I've been throwing up blood since..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've been throwing up blood since winter. Red, like beet root -- been passing it in stool too..."

fields.Title: You: ""Understood.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's disgusting..." He looks down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's disgusting..." He looks down at his shoes; his face parched from the sun and the wind -- there's a wince of pain in there somewhere.

fields.Title: You: ""So in the city you move... undergr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So in the city you move... underground?"

fields.Title: You: ""Why don't you just walk there?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why don't you just walk there?"

fields.Title: You: ""There's a small bunker under the F..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's a small bunker under the Feld building. Have you stayed there?"

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Wait! How did he get down there?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait! How did he get down there?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Are you sure? Forget about it then...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Are you sure? Forget about it then...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Storm drains?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Storm drains?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Traitors. It's better alone." He n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Traitors. It's better alone." He nods toward Martinaise. "I watched the people of this city turn the lights back on, more and more each year. Ruins, glimmering in the dark, like a fucking merry-go-round..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Pride of the "at least we have this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pride of the "at least we have this" kind. This is a cracked honour, a bitter pride. The man sounds like a *communard*. Be careful.

fields.Title: You: ""One more time: what have you used..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One more time: what have you used this gun for?"

fields.Title: You: ""When did you first see the decease..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When did you first see the deceased?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""What?!" The old man's eyes fill wi..."]
You: ""Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor."

fields.Title: You: ""You don't even have a magazine.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't even have a magazine."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Oh, wait. Yes."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, wait. Yes.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." The lieutenant aims his pisto..."]
You: ""It's not wiped from the board. *I*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not wiped from the board. *I* remember it."

fields.Title: You: ""When I said I've talked to *her* -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When I said I've talked to *her* -- you were curious."

fields.Title: Authority: "Forget about that for a moment. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Forget about that for a moment. You need to address that remark first.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Forty-three years... No." He looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forty-three years... No." He looks into the fire -- a wisp of smoke rises from somewhere between the charred logs. "I've been on other islands too."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The boat engine." He gestures nort..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The boat engine." He gestures north. "On the water..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Girl Child Revolution.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Girl Child Revolution."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Where it's morning. On Rue de Saint..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Where it's morning. On Rue de Saint-Ghislaine, people are walking, the gas streetlights have already been switched off. Further inland, in Jamrock, the streets come alive with workers: men, women, children rushing -- muddy avenue after muddy avenue. The temperature is rising. Altocumulus clouds form above Precinct 41.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Always waiting." The old man turns..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Always waiting." The old man turns his eyes from the shore and back to you.

fields.Title: You: ""Once a deserter, always a deserter.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Once a deserter, always a deserter."

fields.Title: You: ""What *have* you done then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What *have* you done then?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""A second is all it took.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A second is all it took."

fields.Title: You: ""For what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "For what?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. We all have a tiny bourgeois..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. We all have a tiny bourgeois person in us, trying to run away."

fields.Title: You: ""What?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?"

fields.Title: You: ""Airships?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Airships?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "Some kind of great terror. Worse th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Some kind of great terror. Worse than you've ever seen.

fields.Title: You: "(Point to yourself.) "I'm also a co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point to yourself.) "I'm also a communist."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No..." He shakes his head. "The *o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No..." He shakes his head. "The *opposite* of that. A future human, not a human of the past."

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me something else.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me something else."

fields.Title: You: ""Understood -- Iblis.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood -- Iblis."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Rock and roll posturing..." He sta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Rock and roll posturing..." He stares at the embers, then into your eyes. "You're the RCM -- you represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

fields.Title: You: ""That's a *choice*. You could have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a *choice*. You could have become self-employed. Create the system."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Yes." There's a smile on his dry l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." There's a smile on his dry lips. "That is true, droite. That is true. That's the punishment in the jungle."
fields.Alternate1: "Yes." There's a smile on his dry lips. "That is true, comrade. That is true. That is the punishment in the jungle."

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you for clearing that up." (..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for clearing that up." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""So you finally found it." He looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you finally found it." He looks at you -- then pulls the raincoat tighter around his neck. "There must have been a small squadron's worth of arms in there. Belle-Magraves, right?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "Grand, violent pride swells in him."
fields.Dialogue Text: Grand, violent pride swells in him.

fields.Title: Drama: "Not in a million years does he beli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not in a million years does he believe Cuno is armed. Perhaps it's the best end he can hope for?

fields.Title: You: ""Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you're und..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you're under arrest for the murder of the colonel."
fields.Alternate1: "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you're under arrest for the murder of Ellis Kortenaer."
fields.Alternate2: "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you're under arrest for the murder of the Krenel colonel here in Martinaise."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["seafort.deserter_who_are_you_hub_got"] == true  and  Variable["seafort.deserter_postponed_arrest"] == false  and  Variable["seafort.phasmid_has_arrived"] == false  and  Variable["seafort.deserter_murder_confession"] == true

fields.Title: The Deserter: "...then spits it out into the extin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...then spits it out into the extinguished fire before him. He raises his black eyes, hooded by creased eyelids, to meet yours.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""A big wheel of the 4th Regiment of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A big wheel of the 4th Regiment of the pederast army." He sighs. "To hell with it. It's a walking stick anyway...."

fields.Title: You: ""Sorry for disturbing you. Good bye.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry for disturbing you. Good bye."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The present to be afraid and cold...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The present to be afraid and cold." The old man pulls back the hood of his plastic cape and looks up into the sky. It's blue grey, the same colour as the sea.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. In the church." (Point southw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. In the church." (Point southwest.)

fields.Title: Shivers: "The cold dissipates. The old man wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cold dissipates. The old man watches you, carefully.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Doubt it, dog...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Doubt it, dog..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's liking this."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's liking this.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Things keep falling apart if you d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Things keep falling apart if you don't tend to them."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Some kind of involuntary response?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Some kind of involuntary response? Something is slightly off with his motorics...

fields.Title: Empathy: "It was dear to him. He resents forg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It was dear to him. He resents forgetting it.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Yes, I am from the Insulindian Cit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I am from the Insulindian Citizens Militia. Recruited from Jamrock in '07, trained in the Ecole de Contrle Arien; consigned to emergency defence duties in '08."

fields.Title: You: ""I come from there." (Point to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I come from there." (Point to the mainland.) "I can assure you, that is *not* what the people are planning."

fields.Title: You: "Don't say it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't say it.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""What *can* I do?" The old man sudd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What *can* I do?" The old man suddenly looks around, suddenly confused.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're a lumpen with a gun." He lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a lumpen with a gun." He looks away.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're with the RCM --" He waves i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're with the RCM --" He waves in your general direction. "The Coalition-appointed mob that oversees the occupation of Revachol. A so-called 'lieutenant'..."

fields.Title: Endurance: "There's definitely something off wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's definitely something off with his body. Something more than just metabolism, or even cancer...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No you're not. You're part of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No you're not. You're part of the *meat shield*." He squints. "The human shield that surrounds the fascists. While they kill and rape. That's what *you* are."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""There's nothing to look over. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's nothing to look over. The triage is in and it's black. Administer morphine. Moribund."

fields.Title: You: ""So you've been there?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you've been there?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Whoa... massive gun." Cuno looks a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whoa... massive gun." Cuno looks at the weapon.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, you can keep it -- but keep..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, you can keep it -- but keep the gun down while we talk."
You should engage him about inframaterialism. Impress him with all the *ideas* you picked up from the reading group.

fields.Title: You: "i wanna see phasmid with kim"
fields.Dialogue Text: i wanna see phasmid with kim

fields.Title: You: ""Lieutenant.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant."

fields.Title: You: ""That's it for now, old man. Stay p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it for now, old man. Stay put." [Leave.]

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Yeah-yeah, one move and you'll kil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah-yeah, one move and you'll kill me. Put me against the wall..." He sighs. "To hell with it, it's a walking stick anyway."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): ""I shoulda known they'd send the fu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I shoulda known they'd send the fucking clowns for me..." You hear him mumble to the blackened logs.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "He stares on, his wrinkled mouth mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He stares on, his wrinkled mouth moving without a sound -- a strange sadness, like a song.

fields.Title: Composure: "He waves erratically -- with his ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He waves erratically -- with his hand, annoyed that he can't remember. A little tremor passes through him.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I should've burned that console do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I should've burned that console down..." He shakes his head.

fields.Title: You: ""It was not rock-and-roll. It was S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was not rock-and-roll. It was Sad FM!"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The fascists were right about rock..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fascists were right about rock-and-roll. It *is* degenerate... Hip-gyrating mental illness music."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not a misanthrope, I'm a half-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not a misanthrope, I'm a half-dead police officer who's just doing his job."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No -- this is a vulgar criticism."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No -- this is a vulgar criticism." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I just *mourn*." He stares right t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just *mourn*." He stares right through you. Then blinks again.

fields.Title: You: ""Lapse of faith?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lapse of faith?"

fields.Title: You: ""What's Reaction?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's Reaction?"

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Airships. Multi-rotored airships us..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Airships. Multi-rotored airships used in the Landing.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I had to, I *had* to fight it. I h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I had to, I *had* to fight it. I had to never stop..." The old man falls silent. His black eyes keep piercing your skin as he looks to some great distance behind you, shaking his head slowly -- retreating from it.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Take me to them as a prisoner of w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Take me to them as a prisoner of war. I have relinquished my weapon, I can no longer serve. No superiors can relieve me of my duty, you bulldozed them all to a mass grave for trying to free humanity..." His hand shakes and he breaks into a coughing fit.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A spray of blood from his mouth, on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A spray of blood from his mouth, on the black charcoal in the firepit...

fields.Title: You: ""Before that, tell me...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Before that, tell me..."

fields.Title: You: ""Understood.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're inert lumpen with a gun.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're inert lumpen with a gun."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're insane and grotesque. Every..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're insane and grotesque. Everyone steals: vegetables, supplies. It's the life of a dog." He coughs once more, then puts his hand on his belly...

fields.Title: You: "(Nod appreciatively.) "I also live..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Nod appreciatively.) "I also live in Hell."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""They're good." He nods. "Plenty of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're good." He nods. "Plenty of tar. I like that boy on the pack too. Reminds me of the last century."

fields.Title: You: ""You don't like this uniform?" (Ges..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't like this uniform?" (Gesture toward your coat.)

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Oh, I love it. Makes me nostalgic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, I love it. Makes me nostalgic for the time we..." He pauses for a moment, catching his breath.
No, don't. This man does not subscribe to intellectual daydreams. The communism he mourns is a planetary force.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He would answer, but something happ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He would answer, but something happened. It's like his tape cut off suddenly...

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: "His lip curls into a sneer at the m..."]
Half Light: "The danger levels here are hard to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The danger levels here are hard to read. One moment he's a fire, the next -- a fire gone out.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm looking at another windbag who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm looking at another windbag who's got a problem with homo-sexuality."

fields.Title: You: ""No, that's not it. I've talked to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, that's not it. I've talked to her."

fields.Title: You: ""How does it go -- the song?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How does it go -- the song?"

fields.Title: You: ""You're a holdover from, the ICM, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a holdover from, the ICM, the Insulindian Citizens Militia?"

fields.Title: You: ""Did you close the blast door?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you close the blast door?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Sad FM, huh? I always hated that s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sad FM, huh? I always hated that station. Phlegmatic, counter-revolutionary dirges... Sadness is a mental illness, a weapon of the bourgeoisie."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Real music. It's La Revacholire,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Real music. It's La Revacholire, you shit-licking boujee dog. *Chanson de soldat* of the black-and-whites."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't even know what that is.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't even know what that is."

fields.Title: You: ""Women will always betray you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Women will always betray you."

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: "The old man does not say more. Thos..."]
The Deserter: ""It's not an island, droite." He lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not an island, droite." He looks around. "It's a defensive fortification of the Commune of Revachol and I am its last surviving defender."

fields.Title: You: ""Airborne landing?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Airborne landing?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Like you belong to the Moralist Pa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like you belong to the Moralist Party..." He squints his eyes at you.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man spits into the fire pit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man spits into the fire pit. He does not say anything more. A jitter passes his lower body...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""How does anyone survive?" He looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How does anyone survive?" He looks at his worn running shoes. "I *steal*."

fields.Title: You: ""The police can give you medical se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The police can give you medical services. You need to be looked over."
fields.Alternate1: "Yes. It may be serious. Cancer, even. The police can give you medical services. You need to be looked over."
fields.Alternate2: "Yes. It may be serious. Cancer, even. The police can give you medical services. You need to be looked over."
fields.Alternate3: "It may be serious. Cancer, even. The police can give you medical services. You need to be looked over."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The propaganda bunker?" He coughs...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The propaganda bunker?" He coughs. "I used to, but not anymore."

fields.Title: You: ""Storm drains?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Storm drains?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The time we wiped every last fucki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The time we wiped every last fucking one of them off this Earth."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""What is it?" The old man looks aro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is it?" The old man looks around, confused. "What do you want from me? I can't go..."

fields.Title: Drama: "Even with the intensity he's puttin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even with the intensity he's putting in those words, and the fidgeting in his pocket, the kid is unconvincing.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Disarmed by a kid..." He smiles to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Disarmed by a kid..." He smiles to himself. "To hell with it. It's a walking stick anyway."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""The fuck?!" Cuno's looking at you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fuck?!" Cuno's looking at you like you just shat yourself.

fields.Title: You: "(Now we are done.) "Iosef Lilianovi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Now we are done.) "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you are under arrest for the murder of the colonel."
fields.Alternate1: (Now we are done.) "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you are under arrest for the murder of Ellis Kortenaer."
fields.Alternate2: (Now we are done.) "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you are under arrest for the murder of the colonel known as Lely."

fields.Title: You: ""Sir, I need you to put down that g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sir, I need you to put down that gun so we can talk further. I'm with the police." (Proceed.)
fields.Alternate1: "Sir, I need you to put down that gun so we can talk further. We're with the police." (Proceed.)

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's a Triangong 4-46.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a Triangong 4-46."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Unclouded by cataracts -- his eyesi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unclouded by cataracts -- his eyesight is sharp.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You don't fucking tell me what the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't fucking tell me what they sang..." He closes his eyes and exhales to calm himself.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""God's shithouse." He chortles. "Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "God's shithouse." He chortles. "Should've taken it down like they did in Graad; dismantled it for firewood."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Heh". The old man squints and look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Heh". The old man squints and looks you straight in the eye -- two black beads, moist from the sea air.

fields.Title: You: "Look at the butt of the gun."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the butt of the gun.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No." He looks into the fire -- a w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." He looks into the fire -- a wisp of smoke rises from somewhere between the charred logs. "I've been on other islands too."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "We have entered a world where he sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We have entered a world where he said you shouldn't. It is the only world.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Forty-three years and 10 months.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forty-three years and 10 months."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "The officers go, leaving behind the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The officers go, leaving behind the writing -- still smouldering. ONE DAY, it says, I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE.

fields.Title: You: ""She better come. I too have given..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She better come. I too have given my life to Mazovian socio-economics."

fields.Title: You: ""Girl Child Revolution?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Girl Child Revolution?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I am not a fool." He blinks his bl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am not a fool." He blinks his black eyes. "I know -- the material base for an uprising has eroded. The working class has betrayed mankind..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You could say I misunderstood the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You could say I misunderstood the historic role of the proletariat, and thought Mazovian socio-economics were fallible. For a second I doubted the irreducible laws of historic materialism."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""And then you see it. As it strangl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And then you see it. As it strangles and beats your friends to death... the sweetest, most courageous people in the world." He's silent for a second. "You see the fear and power in its eyes. Then you *know*."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Petty-bourgeois terror. It's in al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Petty-bourgeois terror. It's in all men."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It remains unclear what *it* is. He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It remains unclear what *it* is. He makes leaps he doesn't expect you to follow.

fields.Title: You: ""Iblis?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Iblis?"

fields.Title: You: ""How have you coped -- mentally?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How have you coped -- mentally?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I would imagine it gets tremendous..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would imagine it gets tremendously difficult -- mentally -- to live in isolation."

fields.Title: You: ""How did you get between here and t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you get between here and the mainland?"

fields.Title: You: ""How did you access the building? I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you access the building? It's locked, at least now it is..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""There used to be a system that con..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There used to be a system that connected the bunkers. Tunnels and such. Under the church and... everywhere. Most of them are gone now, collapsed -- just bricks. All the old infrastructure has..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Loyalist clown uniform..." He clea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Loyalist clown uniform..." He clears his throat, pointing at your coat. "I see they sent the full *fasces*. Royal treatment."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Fucking old man... couldn't keep h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking old man... couldn't keep his rock in..." he whispers, agitated.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Wait-wait!" he turns to you, mouth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait-wait!" he turns to you, mouth open. "Like the fucking... *ancient* army?"

fields.Title: Logic: "He doesn't recognize it."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't recognize it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A Samaran rifle... How did you get..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A Samaran rifle... How did you get hold of one?"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Yell at him, now! LOUD!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Yell at him, now! LOUD!

fields.Title: Authority: "The words "I *am* an enemy commande..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The words "I *am* an enemy commander" sound cold as iron from your lungs. The old man still hugs his gun...

fields.Title: You: ""What's a *briscade*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's a *briscade*?"

fields.Title: You: "Let it be."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it be.

fields.Title: You: ""Understood.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood."

fields.Title: You: ""First, it wasn't *some Samaran shi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First, it wasn't *some Samaran shit*. It was 'Boy with a Scythe'..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I've seen kids lose their minds an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've seen kids lose their minds and start *talking* to the city. Asking it to *protect* them, when the shelling gets bad. Calling it La Revacholire..."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "From ballistics, it could easily ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From ballistics, it could easily have been a Triangong too.

fields.Title: You: ""The rifle has been patched and mod..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The rifle has been patched and modified several times."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man does not answer. He jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man does not answer. He just stares in front of him.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""How did it go..." He looks at his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did it go..." He looks at his gun in your hand and shakes his head slowly.

fields.Title: You: ""That's steadfast.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's steadfast."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""There is nothing serious in this w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is nothing serious in this world." He looks at the gun in your hand. "It's a farce."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""A waste." He blinks his black eyes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A waste." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""...huddled on the floor. The artil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...huddled on the floor. The artillery was eighty kilometres away in Ozonne but I *knew*, I knew the Commune would fall. We would all be turned into ash. So I said I was going to the map room..." He looks east.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""That the bourgeois are not human.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That the bourgeois are not human."

fields.Title: You: ""That's enough. Another thing...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's enough. Another thing..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now is not the time, detective..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now is not the time, detective..." The lieutenant says, gently.
fields.Alternate1: "Now is not the time, Lieutenant-Yefreitor..." The lieutenant says, gently.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "He was like a cleric, a shepherd."
fields.Dialogue Text: He was like a cleric, a shepherd.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You *don't* know. You haven't seen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You *don't* know. You haven't seen it..." He shakes his head, slowly. "Iblis..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No." He shakes his head: "Iblis --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." He shakes his head: "Iblis -- Iblis calls it that."

fields.Title: You: "Really now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Really now?

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Trained," he nods, "in *historical..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Trained," he nods, "in *historical materialism*, then assigned as a *political commissar*. By the Party. These things used to mean something."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No wonder. All your minds are rott..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No wonder. All your minds are rotting from the radio waves..." He nods toward Martinaise. "I watched the *traitors* of this city turn the lights back on. More and more each year. Ruins, glittering in the dark, like a fucking merry-go-round..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I don't want to. They're all trait..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't want to. They're all traitors -- pigs, rabbits, and dogs. Men without ideals are only animals."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In the city you move underground?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "In the city you move underground?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""They stored leaflets there, broadc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They stored leaflets there, broadcasting equipment too. Made broadcasts, I think. Propaganda officers... I buried them with their leaflets. They killed themselves. Two young boys."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""A lot of our boys did... I spent s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A lot of our boys did... I spent some winters there. Never liked it. Kept thinking of them..." He stares at the ruins of the Feld building. "No need to go underground anymore. It's better in the ruins on the ground."

fields.Title: You: ""That wasn't even ordinary rock, it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That wasn't even ordinary rock, it was..."

fields.Title: Composure: "Like an untrained fighter he leans..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like an untrained fighter he leans forward, back hunched, ready to spring.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""I told you not to play shitty rock.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I told you not to play shitty rock."

fields.Title: You: ""Well, guess what? I *am* an enemy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, guess what? I *am* an enemy commander."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Good, *Cuno*. Be that." He nods to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good, *Cuno*. Be that." He nods toward Martinaise. "I saw the *traitors* of this city turn the lights back on. More and more each year. Ruins, glittering in the dark, like a fucking merry-go-round..."

fields.Title: You: "i wanna see phasmid with cuno"
fields.Dialogue Text: i wanna see phasmid with cuno

fields.Title: The Deserter: "An old man wearing tracksuit trouse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An old man wearing tracksuit trousers leans on the frame stock of his rifle. He gathers a big ball of spit in his mouth...

fields.Title: You: ""Put the weapon down, NOW!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Put the weapon down, NOW!"

fields.Title: You: ""Kim?" (Turn to the lieutenant.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim?" (Turn to the lieutenant.)

fields.Title: Interfacing: "You don't see a magazine in the wel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't see a magazine in the well.

fields.Title: You: ""Just put the gun down, okay? I don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just put the gun down, okay? I don't know how else to convince you."

fields.Title: You: ""Who are you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who are you?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man leans on the frame stoc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man leans on the frame stock of his rifle, looking up at you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have *come* to ask you question..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We have *come* to ask you questions, nothing more." The lieutenant puts his hand on his holster.

fields.Title: Composure: "His right eye twitches -- with what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His right eye twitches -- with what? Fear? Rage?

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Or you're gonna blow my brains out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or you're gonna blow my brains out before you question me?" There's a moment's silence. "To hell with it. It's a walking stick anyway."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Everyone has. They named a fucking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everyone has. They named a fucking perfume after it."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "They say: 'Triangong 4.46. Hsin-Yao..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They say: 'Triangong 4.46. Hsin-Yao Commune. For Safre -- and for all mankind.'

fields.Title: You: ""For Safre -- and for all mankind.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "For Safre -- and for all mankind."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "On the butt you see Vespertine writ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On the butt you see Vespertine writing, burnt into the wood: Triangong 4.46 mm, made in Hsin-Yao.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Reactionary rock-and-roll music."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Reactionary rock-and-roll music." He gestures north. "Playing on the water."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I was just sixteen years old, fift..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was just sixteen years old, fifteen when I volunteered. I had a lapse of faith..." He clears his throat. "And of courage too."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Always waiting. Always....""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Always waiting. Always...."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What have you been doing during al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What have you been doing during all this time?"

fields.Title: Shivers: "Where night falls... Hydrogen stree..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Where night falls... Hydrogen streetlamps burn on Rue de Saint-Ghislaine, golden light casting black shadows. Further inland, in Jamrock, the street grid appears black -- unlit avenue after unlit avenue. Altocumulus clouds form above Precinct 41.

fields.Title: You: ""I've been there. The city is a tin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've been there. The city is a tinderbox. It may still happen."

fields.Title: You: ""Girl Child Nation is too strong fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Girl Child Nation is too strong for that."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And this was... when?" The lieuten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And this was... when?" The lieutenant instinctively looks to his notebook, but does not take it out.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""May the 13th, '08, 44 years ago,"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "May the 13th, '08, 44 years ago," he looks north. "The horizon was black with Coalition airships. Their petroleum rose to the sky and it looked like... like it *formed* the clouds. Storm clouds. When they started shelling it was... dark magic."

fields.Title: You: ""That's definitely enough now.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's definitely enough now."

fields.Title: You: ""No, I really am a communist. I hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I really am a communist. I have communist thoughts in my head."

fields.Title: You: ""Murderers. I know what you mean.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Murderers. I know what you mean."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""A liberal and a pederast. It's wha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A liberal and a pederast. It's what most liberals are."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Hmhm." His leg jerks."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmhm." His leg jerks.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're the RCM." He stares at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're the RCM." He stares at the embers, then into your eyes. "You represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

fields.Title: You: ""Is *that* why you've been here for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is *that* why you've been here for 43 years? Because the Party didn't surrender?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Honour is a feudal atavism." He lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honour is a feudal atavism." He looks at the firepit. "My motive is class."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "He does seem frail, gaunt for his a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He does seem frail, gaunt for his age, more like 75 than 65. Trouble putting on weight could mean cancer.

fields.Title: You: ""That's what you get stealing thing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's what you get stealing things."

fields.Title: You: "(You notice the lieutenant is about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (You notice the lieutenant is about to say something.)
fields.Alternate1: (You notice that the adolescent at your side is about to say something.)

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""From bunker to bunker..." He nods...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "From bunker to bunker..." He nods. "Not anymore, no one cares now, I don't even have to hide. They think I'm another antisocial vagrant. I could walk straight into that town if I wanted. I just..." He falls silent, his gaze fixed on the shacks huddled together across the water.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Cuno: ""No fucking way, not on Cuno's life..."]
Rhetoric: "This looked very much like the murd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This looked very much like the murder weapon. It can be used against him to get a confession -- in time...

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""Huh?" He leans closer with a stran..."]
Half Light: "A shudder of disgust passes his rig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A shudder of disgust passes his right side. His left side remains motionless.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." The lieutenant aims his pisto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." The lieutenant aims his pistol square at the man's head and says:

fields.Title: Authority: "That was not the right move. You sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That was not the right move. You should have pushed on.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You heard me. It's good now. Like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You heard me. It's good now. Like chalk wiped from the board." His gaze turns inwards.

fields.Title: Drama: "Look at him raise his bushy brows...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at him raise his bushy brows. That's a lie. He's empty.

fields.Title: Drama: "You were right."
fields.Dialogue Text: You were right.

fields.Title: You: ""The present...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The present..."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Marching song..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Marching song...

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. Must've been that.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Must've been that."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""A fucking perfume..." he sighs."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A fucking perfume..." he sighs.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. I get these... cold spells.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. I get these... cold spells."

fields.Title: You: "Rub your sides."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rub your sides.

fields.Title: You: ""By the way, I'm a fascist.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "By the way, I'm a fascist."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The rifle's in a shabby state, like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The rifle's in a shabby state, like a crutch that's seen too much travel. Hieroglyphs are embossed into the forearm made of walnut.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Worn. Personalized even. Looks lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Worn. Personalized even. Looks like this weapon has seen a lot of use. Hasn't it, sir?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: "No response from the old man. The p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No response from the old man. The plastic cape around his shoulders rustles in a small bout of wind.

fields.Title: Empathy: "As he speaks, he stresses every wor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As he speaks, he stresses every word. He's liking this.

fields.Title: You: ""I have trouble remembering things..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have trouble remembering things too."

fields.Title: You: ""How did you know I was coming?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you know I was coming?"

fields.Title: You: ""For what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "For what?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It won't." He blinks his black eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It won't." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's the same thing... you haven't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's the same thing... you haven't seen *it*. Not really -- not naked. It's impossible not to be afraid."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He does not seemingly react to what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He does not seemingly react to what you said. Only his right brow moves a little.

fields.Title: You: ""Seen *what*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seen *what*?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a nationalist by the way.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a nationalist by the way."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay maybe I'm not.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay maybe I'm not."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The congenitally deformed King Fil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The congenitally deformed King Filippe II built it to restrict access to the Bay of Revachol. We captured it in '02, retrofitted the fort with an AA gun to defend against an airborne landing -- against the whole world."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a revolutionary too. Today the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a revolutionary too. Today the real revolutionizing is done by entrepreneurs."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The RCM can provide medical servic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The RCM can provide medical services. You need to be looked over."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""At least you know it." He nods tow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least you know it." He nods toward Martinaise. "The traitors of this city turned the lights back on in the Thirties, after the fighting stopped. Ruins, glittering in the dark, like a fucking merry-go-round..."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Like the secret route in the Whirli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like the secret route in the Whirling-in-Rags? This is one for later. When you really need it.

fields.Title: Composure: "Something is very wrong with him no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something is very wrong with him now.

fields.Title: You: ""What, specifically, did you not *l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What, specifically, did you not *like* about what you saw the night of the murder?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "This looked very much like the murd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This looked very much like the murder weapon. It can be used against him -- later.

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""What?!" The old man's eyes fill wi..."]
The Deserter: ""And what rank would that be, dog?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And what rank would that be, dog?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's out of bullets." The old man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's out of bullets." The old man lays the rifle down, carelessly, then looks at it lying there.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I ain't going anywhere.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I ain't going anywhere."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It's almost as if they were never t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's almost as if they were never there. Only the rifle remains, cradled by the old man.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""They wouldn't like hearing their n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They wouldn't like hearing their name in your mouth. A damn dog..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You don't understand *anything*."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't understand *anything*." The old man squints at you -- you see two black beads, gleaming.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It is the anthem of the World Revo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is the anthem of the World Revolution." His eyes remain fixed on the sky. "One of three."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I fucking know what they sang!" he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I fucking know what they sang!" he hisses. "I watched those little fuckers die in my arms -- little ones came to help us. Got cut to shreds..."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "This is Vulgate Seraise. You can ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is Vulgate Seraise. You can barely intuit the words. *Know* is stretching it.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Embers going out."
fields.Dialogue Text: Embers going out.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""What are you talking about?" He sq..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you talking about?" He squints and looks you straight in the eye -- two black beads, moist from the sea air.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Told you we shouldn't play Sad FM.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Told you we shouldn't play Sad FM."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""For her to return.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "For her to return."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Where the afternoon grows late. On..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Where the afternoon grows late. On Rue de Saint-Ghislaine people walk home, streetlights will soon be lit. Further inland the streets are alive with workers: men, women, children. Streethawks and migrant labourers. The temperature is steady. Altocumulus clouds form above Precinct 41.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "So that's why he's 'the deserter.'"
fields.Dialogue Text: So that's why he's 'the deserter.'

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We keep people alive. We help them..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We keep people alive. We help them survive, whatever the ideological situation. Day in and day out."

fields.Title: You: ""Understood.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood."

fields.Title: You: ""It wasn't Reaction -- you were jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It wasn't Reaction -- you were just afraid."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You haven't seen *it*. The face of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You haven't seen *it*. The face of who you serve -- naked. It's impossible not to be afraid."

fields.Title: You: ""What then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What then?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "These eyes are charred black by the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These eyes are charred black by the images that have entered them.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing. Let him finish."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing. Let him finish.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He looks away, to the sea, and lets..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He looks away, to the sea, and lets out a cough.

fields.Title: You: ""You never signed the Revacholian I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You never signed the Revacholian Instrument of Surrender..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Fire-guy..." He shakes his head. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fire-guy..." He shakes his head. "Regressive bourgeoisie henchman. Can't even talk like a grown up."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective." The lieutenant gives y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective." The lieutenant gives you a stern look. "We have not come here to discuss ideology." He then turns to the old man.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "There's no way he could manage the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no way he could manage the pain without them. It's safe to say he is addicted to painkillers by now.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""What?" The old man looks up -- the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?" The old man looks up -- the whites of his eyes are pale yellow.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So you've been there?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you've been there?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Technically this wasn't traditional..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Technically this wasn't traditional rock. It was more *independent melodic*.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's actually quite light. It was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's actually quite light. It was sent to us by our brothers in the Hsin-Yao Commune. Military aid." He pats the rifle.

fields.Title: Half Light: "He's high off the fear."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's high off the fear.

fields.Title: You: ""What have you been using this gun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What have you been using this gun for?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""What have I used it for..." He loo..."]
You: ""Lieutenant-Yefreitor.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant-Yefreitor."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Put it down *now*, sir.""]
The Deserter: ""Yes, I bet you've killed a lot of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I bet you've killed a lot of people with it..." His eyes narrow. "...you fascist *fuck*."

fields.Title: Drama: "There was something there -- when h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There was something there -- when he said *talked to her*? He was curious...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Those men were commandos. They wer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those men were commandos. They weren't shit on a stick, like us. They were small and..." He doesn't say more. The thought dissipates on his lips.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It doesn't matter if it was made i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't matter if it was made in Shantih-Shantih. All it has to do is use jacketed ammunition. And it does."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Jacketed -- military-grade ammunit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Jacketed -- military-grade ammunition. Stable in flight, good for hitting something that's very, very far away..." He says -- mostly to the old man.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Something about shooting *rabbits,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Something about shooting *rabbits,* I don't know... I can't remember. It doesn't matter. It's gone now."

fields.Title: You: ""So you're a communist soldier? Fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you're a communist soldier? From the communist army?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I did," he breathes out with a whe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did," he breathes out with a wheeze. "And you opened it -- how?"

fields.Title: You: ""Her, who?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Her, who?"

fields.Title: You: ""I have another, serious question f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have another, serious question for you."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Patrol Officer Judit Minot points w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Patrol Officer Judit Minot points west. "The fishing village..." She glances at her watch. "We meet in 15 minutes. It's a ten minute walk."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The material base for an uprising..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The material base for an uprising has eroded." He nods and blinks his black eyes. "The working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I have done everything a man can d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have done everything a man can do. What have *you* done?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Aerostatics. The Landing had start..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Aerostatics. The Landing had started. I climbed out -- into hell. There were ships all above. Hissing, whirling, and men pouring out. The chain was submerged so I had to swim back. The fortress was half submerged too, shattered."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""They'd all drowned in the lower le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They'd all drowned in the lower levels, or got torn to shreds above. The anti-aircraft gun had malfunctioned -- so had I. I left them without ideological direction..." He opens his eyes and stares right through you. "It was real. I'd seen it. I'd seen it *in reality*."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He does not believe a police office..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He does not believe a police officer is genuinely revolutionary.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""*Death Blow*. You're one of them...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Death Blow*. You're one of them. Tell me, who speaks like that? We had 50 million people on Caillou alone..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man does not answer. He til..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man does not answer. He tilts his silver head and looks at the reeds -- you see a small tremor pass through his legs.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not 'Coalition-appointed.' I j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not 'Coalition-appointed.' I just try to help people."
fields.Alternate1: "We're not 'Coalition-appointed.' We just try to help people."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're the RCM." He stares at you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're the RCM." He stares at you coldly. "You represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How is your health, Mr. Dros?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How is your health, Mr. Dros?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He coughs, then looks to his feet,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He coughs, then looks to his feet, suddenly despondent.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Only when my health permits." He s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Only when my health permits." He shrugs. "I check my old haunts..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He does not want to see life moving..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He does not want to see life moving on. People forgetting. Drinking. Laughing.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "You *feel* the dots connecting. Lit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You *feel* the dots connecting. Little dots on the map he's walked across.

fields.Title: You: ""Killed themselves?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Killed themselves?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Looks like old shit.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like old shit."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He is not afraid of such displays...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is not afraid of such displays. This was the wrong move...

fields.Title: You: "Pick up the gun lying in the sand."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pick up the gun lying in the sand.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's not nice, it's a piece of shi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not nice, it's a piece of shit." He shrugs. "But it gets the job done."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant pulls his pistol fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant pulls his pistol from the holster.

fields.Title: You: ""I *am* an enemy commander of rank..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *am* an enemy commander of rank -- put it down."
fields.variable7: CheckEquipped("jacket_caribineer")  and  (CheckEquipped("boots_cavalry")  or  CheckEquipped("pants_caribineer")  or  CheckEquipped("neck_setting_sun_medal"))

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, but keep the gun down while..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, but keep the gun down while we talk."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Fucking clown..." He squeezes his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking clown..." He squeezes his eyelids shut and shakes his head slowly.

fields.Title: You: "Let him say it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let him say it.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man pulls back the hood of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man pulls back the hood of his plastic cape and looks up into the sky.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""My name..." He looks across the wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My name..." He looks across the water, then back at you: "...is Iosef Lilianovich Dros, Political Commissar of the 114th Anti-Aircraft Division of the 4th Army of the Commune of Revachol."

fields.Title: Composure: "His nostrils are still flaring with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His nostrils are still flaring with rage. He brings himself back under his own stewardship, slowly.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're not. You're part of the mea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not. You're part of the meat shield surrounding the *real* fascists, while they rape children. That's what *you* are."

fields.Title: Drama: "Don't be so sure..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't be so sure...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The job of a boujee dog.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The job of a boujee dog."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Still warm from his parched hands...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Still warm from his parched hands. Not the metal. The metal is ice cold. This weapon has been modified several times.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The right type and the right calib..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The right type and the right calibre," the lieutenant nods -- glancing at the gun.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I left my unit on the eve of the L..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I left my unit on the eve of the Landing. When I returned here on May 14th the Commune had fallen. Still armed -- and *ideologically trained* -- I wrote a criticism of myself. And resumed partisan duties."

fields.Title: You: ""So if I can shoot rabbits, then I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So if I can shoot rabbits, then I can shoot fascists too."

fields.Title: You: ""You said this is your *termless su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said this is your *termless surrender*."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The job of a shit-licker.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The job of a shit-licker."

fields.Title: You: ""You said you deserted your unit?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said you deserted your unit?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's too long. It's not how a huma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's too long. It's not how a human being should live..." He grimaces, clearly in pain. "But I couldn't just forget what I saw."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's inhuman. It's sick. It's not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's inhuman. It's sick. It's not how a human being should live, but I had to..." He grimaces, clearly in pain. "I couldn't just forget. I couldn't just forget what I saw."

fields.Title: Volition: "He just *couldn't*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He just *couldn't*...

fields.Title: You: ""You couldn't give up.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You couldn't give up."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Where evening comes. On Rue de Sain..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Where evening comes. On Rue de Saint-Ghislaine hydrogen streetlights switch on, casting black shadows. Further inland, the street grid appears dark -- unlit avenue after unlit avenue. The temperature is dropping. Altocumulus clouds form above Precinct 41.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No." He blinks his black eyes. "Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "What *has* he done? Perhaps a confe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What *has* he done? Perhaps a confession will lighten the load...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's not *enough*," he hisses. "Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not *enough*," he hisses. "The total, combined power of international capital -- all their fear and terror -- tore into Revachol. Streets rose from the ground... houses turned to ghosts." He gestures erratically, then falls silent.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "He is still not convinced of his sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is still not convinced of his safety -- you should not be either.

fields.Title: You: ""What was it used for?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was it used for?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Coalition military called it Opera..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Coalition military called it Operation *Death Blow*." He winces. "I later found out, on the radio. They called it..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're with the RCM --" He waves i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're with the RCM --" He waves in your general direction. "The Coalition-appointed mob that enforces bourgeois morals in Revachol. A so-called 'lieutenant double-yefreitor'..."

fields.Title: You: ""That means you're a trained commun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That means you're a trained communist, right?"

fields.Title: Composure: "The expression on his face is unrea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The expression on his face is unreadable. There's some sort of interference there... neurological?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her, who?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Her, who?"

fields.Title: You: ""This is a serious situation. You n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is a serious situation. You need to be looked over and we can do it."

fields.Title: You: ""Ever smoke them on the mainland?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ever smoke them on the mainland?" (Point to Land's End.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant exchanges a quick gl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant exchanges a quick glance with you, then turns to the man...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There were posters. Campaigns.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "There were posters. Campaigns."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Ssssssh! You're making us look lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ssssssh! You're making us look like shit."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Supercool. What's it say?" He soun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Supercool. What's it say?" He sounds incredulous.

fields.Title: You: ""One more time, Mr. Dros -- the Col..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One more time, Mr. Dros -- the Colonel. We need to talk about you *killing* him."

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""Petty-bourgeois law..." He snorts..."]
You: ""Been looking at anything else you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Been looking at anything else you haven't *liked*?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""A tragicomedy..." He shakes to lif..."]
The Deserter: "He scoffs. The corner of his black..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He scoffs. The corner of his black eye twitches. He does not reply to the command.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "His elbows rest on the frame stock,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His elbows rest on the frame stock, calmly for now, but he may still get it in his hands. Looks like he knows the weapon...

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not from the homo army.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not from the homo army."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "He's right. Almost no one remembers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's right. Almost no one remembers there was a third metastasis of the World Revolution, in the Safre Empire, extinguished in '06.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No one cares, droite." He shakes h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one cares, droite." He shakes his head.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Talked to *her*?" He raises his bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Talked to *her*?" He raises his bushy brow and looks down from the sky -- straight into your bloodshot eye.

fields.Title: Authority: "You need to address that remark."
fields.Dialogue Text: You need to address that remark.

fields.Title: You: ""This is a Triangong, made in Hsin-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is a Triangong, made in Hsin-Yao."

fields.Title: You: ""You're a holdover from the Army of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a holdover from the Army of the Commune of Revachol?"

fields.Title: You: ""It was not reactionary. It was coo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was not reactionary. It was cool."

fields.Title: You: ""Again -- you've been hiding here f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Again -- you've been hiding here for *43 years*?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm afraid she's gone.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid she's gone."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Always...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Always..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The historic opportunity for a rev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The historic opportunity for a revolution has passed. It will not come back anymore. However hard I try, whatever I do."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Well done. I won't explain it to a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well done. I won't explain it to a minion of capital."
fields.Alternate1: "Good. I shouldn't have to explain it to a comrade."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I had to. I *had* to fight it. I c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I had to. I *had* to fight it. I could not stop anymore..." The old man falls silent. His black eyes keep piercing your skin as he looks to some great distance behind you, shaking his head slowly -- retreating from it.

fields.Title: You: ""Coalition military.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Coalition military."

fields.Title: You: ""Someone who's come to end this mad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Someone who's come to end this madness."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Okay then. Over-mystified that a bi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay then. Over-mystified that a bit..

fields.Title: You: ""That's insane.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's insane."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No, I am not a soldier. I am an id..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I am not a soldier. I am an ideological officer -- I belong to the Party, not the Army."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I *need* to die." A droll smile st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *need* to die." A droll smile stretches across his mouth. "You don't have medical facilities, you have guns. That's all they give you, toy guns."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You also have Drouamine."
fields.Dialogue Text: You also have Drouamine.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I haven't. I have holes in my brai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I haven't. I have holes in my brain. Years missing, others filled with pain only. A decade of..." His eyes roll into his skull and back...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""What was it like? There was hope,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was it like? There was hope, a little hope. They needed to snuff it out. Martinaise and Coal City were turned to dust..." He looks south. "But Jamrock, Faubourg, even Couron; and Boogie Street of course -- those fucking kipts had Kras Mazov coursing in their veins..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man stares despondently at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man stares despondently at the logs. It's like he's forgotten you're there...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Cities can't talk. It's bourgeois..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cities can't talk. It's bourgeois idealism... I don't wanna talk about this shit anymore."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""My pig asked you a question. Quit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My pig asked you a question. Quit spazzin' out and tell him about the..." The kid doesn't get to finish the sentence.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's practically tearing up from sp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's practically tearing up from spite. Hatred got the best of him a long time ago. This man hates everything.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Southeast Samaran-made. Exotic. Mus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Southeast Samaran-made. Exotic. Must be defunct too. No modern rifle manufacturer of that name springs to mind.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It was sent to us by our brothers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was sent to us by our brothers in the Hsin-Yao Commune. Military aid." He pats the rifle.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're right. It's a good thing I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. It's a good thing I got one in the chamber."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Did I offend your moralist sensibi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did I offend your moralist sensibilities? You beat people to death with a baton, you fucking dog!" The old man spits.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant aims his pistol squa..."]
Hand/Eye Coordination: "It has stayed true to him. He can s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It has stayed true to him. He can still make it sing.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm with the police. You can keep..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm with the police. You can keep the gun, but keep it down. Not *one* move." (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The time will come to win his trust..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The time will come to win his trust, comrade. It is not now. You need to take care of the gun first.

fields.Title: You: ""What did you say?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What did you say?"

fields.Title: You: ""La Revacholire... I've heard that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "La Revacholire... I've heard that name, somewhere else. In a dream."

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you for clearing that up." (..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for clearing that up." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: "No, he was just confused. Let it go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, he was just confused. Let it go...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I am a deserter, a partisan, and a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am a deserter, a partisan, and a prisoner of war. This is my termless surrender." His eyes turn to the reeds again, dead and dull.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "There, behind them, across the Delt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There, behind them, across the Delta -- the INSURCOM building. Coalition Government Insulindian Mission Control.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I did.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did."

fields.Title: You: ""That's the length of my entire lif..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's the length of my entire life."

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing in history is guaranteed...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing in history is guaranteed. But revolution is still a possibility."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Good." He blinks his black eyes. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

fields.Title: You: ""What was that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was that?"

fields.Title: Authority: "A terrible shame, still within him...."
fields.Dialogue Text: A terrible shame, still within him. The lobes of his ears are red with it, the shame and smallness of what he became.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""*The* Landing. Coalition military..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*The* Landing. Coalition military called it 'Operation Death Blow.'" He winces. "I later found out, on the radio -- they called it..."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Sha'i'tan, Ahura, The Darkened One."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sha'i'tan, Ahura, The Darkened One.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're with the RCM --" He waves i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're with the RCM --" He waves in your general direction. "The Coalition-appointed mob that enforces bourgeois morals in Revachol."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I may have. All sorts of little ra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I may have. All sorts of little rats have come sniffing around, trying to give up the position..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I *have* been running out of that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *have* been running out of that stuff..." A light goes on in his eyes. He smacks his dry lips.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I don't even know what... *Inferno..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't even know what... *Inferno*?"

fields.Title: You: ""What was it like?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was it like?"

fields.Title: You: ""They were.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "They were."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Minion of capital." He spits. "Wha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Minion of capital." He spits. "What do you want?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Hey..." The kid must have some ide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey..." The kid must have some idea. "You go to Martinaise lately? Cuno hasn't seen you around..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "His gaze follows your motions. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His gaze follows your motions. The rifle feels surprisingly light in your hand, frame stocked and patched in places with tape and wire.

fields.Title: You: ""What make of rifle is that, exactl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What make of rifle is that, exactly?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""My eyesight?" He clears his throat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My eyesight?" He clears his throat. "Yes. Helps me see all the shit."

fields.Title: You: ""The Hsin-Yao Commune?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Hsin-Yao Commune?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""*Real music, real proletkult*." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Real music, real proletkult*." He nods. "That's La Revacholire, not your rock-and-roll misanthropy. *Chanson de soldat* of the black-and-whites."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""There you go." His eyes remain fix..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There you go." His eyes remain fixed on the sky as he sighs and adds: "One of three."
