fields.Title: Shivers: "All around you, the air slowly circ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All around you, the air slowly circulates the islet, carrying little swallows and black-beaked seagulls in its slow drift. They all -- every one of them, every bird, mammal, and crustacean...

fields.Title: You: "What?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What?

fields.Title: You: "Inspect it closer."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspect it closer.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The Commune of Revachol..." The li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Commune of Revachol..." The lieutenant forgets to close his mouth. "Do you mean the ICM? You're a holdover from the..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Hiding, fishing, waiting..." He lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hiding, fishing, waiting..." He looks across the water.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "The officers go, leaving behind the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The officers go, leaving behind the writing, still smelling of petroleum. ONE DAY, it says, I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE.

fields.Title: You: ""I dare not dream anymore.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I dare not dream anymore."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""They have *you*." He blinks his bl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They have *you*." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""There is no flame to fan." He star..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is no flame to fan." He stares right through at him, blinking his dark eyes. "There is nothing left -- of the world, of our dreams."

fields.Title: You: ""You didn't go to the map room.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You didn't go to the map room."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""His job was to assure the army ans..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "His job was to assure the army answers to civilian control -- and follows the ideology of the commune," the lieutenant says softly.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Awakened from shutdown by the promi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Awakened from shutdown by the promise of *ideology*.

fields.Title: You: ""We enforce the law. We keep these..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We enforce the law. We keep these animals from killing each other."

fields.Title: You: ""Did you recently tell two kids to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you recently tell two kids to put out their fire? Two twins."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have come to ask questions rega..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We have come to ask questions regarding a murder investigation."

fields.Title: Endurance: "There's definitely something off wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's definitely something off with his body. Something more than just metabolism...

fields.Title: You: ""How is your health?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How is your health?"

fields.Title: You: ""You like that drouamine, don't you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You like that drouamine, don't you?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Ren, the royalist on the coast sai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ren, the royalist on the coast said...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you go to Martinaise often thes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you go to Martinaise often these days?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It was hard in the '10s..." He sha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was hard in the '10s..." He shakes his head. "I didn't have partisan training, they were searching for stragglers, those bloodhounds..." He closes his eyes. "Floodlights on the water at night."

fields.Title: You: ""The weapons cache under Saint-Ghis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The weapons cache under Saint-Ghislaine 22B." (Point to it.) "In the basement. Have you been there?"

fields.Title: You: ""Propaganda bunker?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Propaganda bunker?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Fucking NOW!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking NOW!"

fields.Title: You: "Assess his body language."
fields.Dialogue Text: Assess his body language.

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""Three weeks ago, when the rich hag..."]
You: ""Nice gun you got there.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nice gun you got there."

fields.Title: You: ""How did you get hold of it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you get hold of it?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're a glorified night-watchman...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a glorified night-watchman." He looks you in the eye. "This is a service rifle. I can only lay it down before an enemy commander of corresponding rank."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Pain Threshold: "Like an amputated limb in the sand."]
Interfacing: "There does not seem to be a magazin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There does not seem to be a magazine in the well...  the rifle's side is clearly visible.

fields.Title: You: ""You've retained your eyesight.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've retained your eyesight."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Fucking clowns..." He squeezes his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking clowns..." He squeezes his eyelids shut and shakes his head slowly.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's out of bullets." He lays the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's out of bullets." He lays the rifle down, slowly. Then just looks at it lying there.

fields.Title: You: ""Those words: 'the future teaches y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those words: 'the future teaches you...'"

fields.Title: You: "I know Seraise?"
fields.Dialogue Text: I know Seraise?

fields.Title: You: "(Whisper.) "Kim, I know Seraise.""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Whisper.) "Kim, I know Seraise."

fields.Title: You: ""For Safre -- and for all mankind?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "For Safre -- and for all mankind?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man keeps following your mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man keeps following your motions with his gaze. His right arm twitches suddenly...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Hmhm." The old man smacks his lips..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmhm." The old man smacks his lips.

fields.Title: You: ""You've been on this island for 43..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've been on this island for 43 years?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's not how a human being should..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not how a human being should live, but I had to..." He grimaces, clearly in pain. "...I couldn't just forget. I couldn't just forget what I saw."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Two police officers step out of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two police officers step out of the Whirling-in-Rags cafeteria. Satellite-Officer Jean Vicquemare inspects giant letters across the plaza mosaic, in dark red government-marked heavy fuel oil.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""There is nothing serious in this w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is nothing serious in this world." He looks at the gun lying on the ground. "It's a farce."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Survive?" The old man spits into t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Survive?" The old man spits into the dead fire. "For *what*?"

fields.Title: You: ""And when was this exactly?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And when was this exactly?"

fields.Title: You: ""Dark magic?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Dark magic?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Let's." He looks you in the eye. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's." He looks you in the eye. "You represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not really into politics mysel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not really into politics myself."

fields.Title: You: ""I also have holes in my brain." (P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I also have holes in my brain." (Point to your head.)

fields.Title: You: ""One more question -- do you smoke..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One more question -- do you smoke Tioumoutiri cigarettes?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He opens his eyes and looks at some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He opens his eyes and looks at something, to your left... then at you.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I didn't have to. Came in through..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I didn't have to. Came in through the storm drains."

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me another thing..." (Conclud..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me another thing..." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Cuno: ""No fucking way, not on Cuno's life..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No fucking way, not on Cuno's life..." he mumbles. With his finger pointing at the deserter -- through his jacket pocket -- the kid turns to the old man.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Officer Cuno's got his Kiejl A9 po..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer Cuno's got his Kiejl A9 pointed at your fucking head and he's gonna blow it clean off if you don't drop your weapon right now!" His pointed finger is moving inside his pocket.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The present..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The present...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant aims his pistol squa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant aims his pistol square at the man's forehead.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Put it down *now*, sir.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Put it down *now*, sir."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Clearly not *you*. What do you wan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Clearly not *you*. What do you want from me anyway?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: "Another spitball lands in the ashes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Another spitball lands in the ashes. That's all the answer he gives.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you do not comply, we will take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you do not comply, we will take you in. Do you understand?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No one said it has to be a Belle-M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one said it has to be a Belle-Magrave..." The lieutenant does not take his eyes off the old man. "We were just guessing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wonder how old it is.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wonder how old it is."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""How did it go..." He looks at his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did it go..." He looks at his gun on the ground and shakes his head slowly.

fields.Title: You: ""How have you survived all this tim..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How have you survived all this time?"

fields.Title: You: ""What have you been doing all this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What have you been doing all this time?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Two police officers step out of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two police officers step out of the Whirling-in-Rags cafeteria. Satellite-Officer Jean Vicquemare inspects a series of burnt black letters splashed across the plaza mosaic.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man suddenly looks around,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man suddenly looks around, confused. "What *can* I do? What is there..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Airships. I climbed out." He close..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Airships. I climbed out." He closes his eyes: "Into hell. The Landing was complete. The chain was submerged, I had to swim back. The fortress was half submerged too. Shattered."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I ran. I climbed the chain link ac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I ran. I climbed the chain link across the water and hid inland. In the bunkers underground, like the weakest of the weak... a mouse. Frightened of the ordnance all night and the sound of the rotors in the morning, whirring -- *thith-thith-thith...*" He looks at the sky.

fields.Title: You: ""What is this place? This island...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is this place? This island..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""All the real communists are dead...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All the real communists are dead. They died fighting for *communism* -- are you *dead*?" His voice turns into a hiss: "No. You're an inert lumpen with a gun."

fields.Title: You: ""So you were like a priest?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you were like a priest?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Scientific communism!" The tracksu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Scientific communism!" The tracksuit-clad old man is suddenly reanimated. "A *comissaire politique* is a knight-philosopher of the Revolution, a future human."

fields.Title: You: ""Understood." (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I don't think you did." He stares..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think you did." He stares at the firepit. "You live in a delusion. Radio shows, speed racing, and sporting goods. It's not real..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He nods slowly. Then another tremor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods slowly. Then another tremor.

fields.Title: You: ""Yep -- that's me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yep -- that's me."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you steal?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you steal?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Now hold on there..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now hold on there...

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's the little joys..." A crooked..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's the little joys..." A crooked smile appears on his face. "A dark joke. A sunshiny day. Morphine..."

fields.Title: You: ""How have you concealed yourself al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How have you concealed yourself all these years?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Minions of capital," he spits. "Wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Minions of capital," he spits. "What do you want?"

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "It has stayed true to him. He can s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It has stayed true to him. He can still make it sing.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""This guy's smoked a lot of people..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This guy's smoked a lot of people with this, huh?"

fields.Title: You: ""A Samaran-made rifle.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A Samaran-made rifle."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""A big time operator of the pederas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A big time operator of the pederast army. How about I keep it, huh? Hand it over to a real killer. A *briscade*."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""It's out of bullets." The old man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's out of bullets." The old man lays the rifle down, carelessly -- then stares at it, just lying there.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You *fasces* are pathetic when you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You *fasces* are pathetic when you're alone..." He snorts. "To hell with it. It's a walking stick anyway..."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Military aid," he pats the rifle,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Military aid," he pats the rifle, "from our brothers in the Hsin-Yao Commune."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Like an amputated limb in the sand."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like an amputated limb in the sand.

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""You *fasces* are pathetic when you..."]
You: ""Nothing. We have serious things to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. We have serious things to talk about."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What does it say?" he asks doubtfu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What does it say?" he asks doubtfully.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "The old man blinks slowly. A strang..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man blinks slowly. A strange jitter comes over him, he pushes his right leg down and does not reply.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""From the Insulindian Citizens Mili..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "From the Insulindian Citizens Militia -- the Army of the Revolution. I was recruited in Jamrock in '07, trained in the Ecole de Contrle Arien and consigned to emergency defence duties in '08."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I was on Rsurrection until they t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was on Rsurrection until they turned it into a *spa* in '18. Then I was on E48, a nameless sound, until the sea washed over it. Then I came back here. That was..." He thinks. "Twenty-two years ago."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "'So if I can shoot rabbits then I c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'So if I can shoot rabbits then I can shoot fascists too' -- those are the next lines.

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He squints and looks you straight i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He squints and looks you straight in the eye -- two black beads, moist from the sea air.

fields.Title: You: ""But you didn't say that, Kim.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But you didn't say that, Kim."

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods.

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""No. I climbed the chain link acros..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I climbed the chain link across the water and hid inland. In the bunkers there, like the weakest of the weak... a mouse. Frightened of the ordnance all night and the sound of the rotors in the morning, whirring -- *thith-thith-thith...*" He looks at the sky.

fields.Title: You: ""I've always suspected the same..""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've always suspected the same.."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""The black-eyed angel," he nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The black-eyed angel," he nods.

fields.Title: You: ""Liberast?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Liberast?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""*You're* insane." He stares at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*You're* insane." He stares at the firepit. "Radio shows, speed racing, sporting goods... None of it is real."

fields.Title: You: ""Understood.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood."

fields.Title: You: ""Are you the *fire-guy*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you the *fire-guy*?"

fields.Title: You: "(Point to yourself.) "I'm a moralis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point to yourself.) "I'm a moralist."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not a liberal. I told you I'm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not a liberal. I told you I'm a communist."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""We communards still hoped and they..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We communards still hoped and they needed to snuff that hope out. The East capitulated, Martinaise and Coal City were turned to dust..." He looks south. "But Jamrock, Faubourg, even Couron; and Boogie Street of course -- those fucking kipts had Mazov coursing through their veins..."

fields.Title: You: ""Another thing...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Another thing..."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Oh yeah... that's hard core, Cuno'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yeah... that's hard core, Cuno's gonna like this."

fields.Title: You: "(Whisper.) "Cuno, I know Seraise.""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Whisper.) "Cuno, I know Seraise."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Cuno's dad has this shit. Wine bel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno's dad has this shit. Wine belly." The kid looks at you. "The cops can take care of this, right? Medicine shit. With, like, facilities."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Cuno could do this shit. Live all..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno could do this shit. Live all alone like this. Cuno could hack it."

fields.Title: Volition: "But he can now."
fields.Dialogue Text: But he can now.

fields.Title: You: ""Is that a Belle-Magrave?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that a Belle-Magrave?"

fields.Title: You: ""Your weapon has stayed true to you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Your weapon has stayed true to you. Mine has stayed true to me too." (Put your hand on your belt.)
fields.Alternate1: "Your weapon has stayed true to you. Mine has stayed true to me too." (Show him the gun in your hand.)

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Have you come to make me one of th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you come to make me one of them?" His grip on the rifle tightens.

fields.Title: You: ""I know La Revacholire. It's the m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know La Revacholire. It's the marching song of the World Revolution."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Keep their distance."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep their distance.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not a shit-licking boujee dog...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not a shit-licking boujee dog. I'm a half-dead police officer who's just doing his job."

fields.Title: You: "Stow the gun. (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: Stow the gun. (Conclude.)

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""That's what the little guys told u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's what the little guys told us." The old man says silently. "Every day at 4 o'clock in the morning, they'd go on and on about their Safre, their mankind, and Mazov..."

fields.Title: You: ""This uses jacketed ammunition. 4.4..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This uses jacketed ammunition. 4.46."

fields.Title: You: ""How long have you been on this isl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How long have you been on this island?"

fields.Title: You: ""I fuelled the generator. Then used..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I fuelled the generator. Then used the console."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Patrol Officer Judit Minot points w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Patrol Officer Judit Minot points west. "The fishing village..." She glances at her watch. "We meet in 15 minutes. It's a ten minute walk."

fields.Title: You: ""I've seen it." (Shake your head.)..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've seen it." (Shake your head.) "Capital is too powerful. The rich are very well organized."

fields.Title: You: ""I understand. Communists are natur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I understand. Communists are natural cowards. Quantity over quality."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Conceptualization: "These eyes are charred black by the..."]
The Deserter: ""No you're not." He coughs. "You're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No you're not." He coughs. "You're a *liberast*."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, what does a 'political commi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, what does a 'political commissar' do?"

fields.Title: The Deserter: "He shakes his head and says: "Iblis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He shakes his head and says: "Iblis."

fields.Title: You: ""First, I'm not *one of them*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "First, I'm not *one of them*."

fields.Title: You: ""I know what it looks like. But I h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know what it looks like. But I have secret plans to turn the RCM into a Mazovian revolutionary unit."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm with the RCM -- let's leave it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm with the RCM -- let's leave it at that."
fields.Alternate1: "We're with the RCM -- let's leave it at that."

fields.Title: You: ""The communards signed the Revachol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The communards signed the Revacholian Instrument of Surrender."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Liberal reactionaries signed that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Liberal reactionaries signed that instrument -- traitors, who should have been burned alive..." He draws his breath. "I answer to the Communist Party."
fields.Alternate1: "Only the Army. Liberal reactionaries signed it for them. Traitors, who should have been burned alive..." He draws his breath. "I am a political commissar of the Communist Party, and the Party *never* surrendered."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Is that part of why you've been he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that part of why you've been here all this time? Because the Party didn't surrender?"

fields.Title: You: ""Honourable.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honourable."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""You're part of the *meat shield*."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're part of the *meat shield*." He squints. "The human meat shield that surrounds the fascists and the license holders. You take the fire, while they rape and kill. That's what *you* are."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Supplies, vegetables..." He winces..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Supplies, vegetables..." He winces. "I collect rainwater. It's the life of a dog, not a human being." He coughs once more, then puts his hand on his belly...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Propaganda bunker?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Propaganda bunker?"

fields.Title: You: ""They were damaged beyond use.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "They were damaged beyond use."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""I know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know."

fields.Title: The Deserter: ""Useless now. Rusted away...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Useless now. Rusted away..."

fields.Title: You: ""You didn't say that, Cuno. You wer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You didn't say that, Cuno. You weren't even on the boat."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Fuck yeah, this is happening," he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck yeah, this is happening," he comments breathlessly, in awe of the potential violence implied.

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Deserter: ""Them fucking..." He looks at the c..."]

fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I really am a communist. I have communist thoughts in my head."
fields.Alternate1: "No, I really am a communist. A Nilsenist inframaterialist."
